starvationevasion.server.model

Class RequestFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.server.model.RequestFactory

  • public class RequestFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that creates requests. Keeps the code a little cleaner. Makes the Request creation centralized to prevent bugs especially since we have many different ways of serializing objects in this codebase.

        public <T> Request chat(double time,
                        T destination,
                        java.lang.String text,
                        GameCard card)
        Create a chat Request
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of destination (String, EnumRegion)
        Parameters:
        time - current client time
        destination - of where to send the chat
        text - to be sent with chat
        card - card to be sent with chat
        Returns:
        chat request

      • login

        public Request login(double time,
                     java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password,
                     EnumRegion region)
        Create a Login Request
        Parameters:
        time - current client time
        username - username of the user
        password - string password
        region - region of user. Can be null
        Returns:
        Request built with given information
